profess.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to say that you do, are etc something, especially when it is not really true
profess.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The government professes to care about the poor.
He professed to be an expert on Islamic art.
profess.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to state a personal feeling or belief openly
profess.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He finally made up his mind to profess his love for her.
He professed himself satisfied with the results.
profess.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to have a religion or belief
